remarks: Measurability of a piecewise function: if ` F ` is measurable on subsets ` B ` and ` C ` of its domain, and these pieces make up all of ` A ` , then ` F ` is measurable on the whole domain.  Similar to ~mbfres2 but here the theorem is extended to complex valued functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:

mbfres2cn.b $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfres2cn.c $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` C ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfres2cn.a $e |- ( ph -> ( B u. C ) = A ) $.
mbfres2cn $p |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
